sentences.en: A rucksack has straps that go over the shoulders.
All his camping gear was packed in the rucksack.
sentences.cn: 他的野营物品全都放在背囊里了.

sentences.en: Charlie humped his rucksack up the stairs to his flat.
sentences.cn: 查利费力地将背包背到楼上自己的公寓里。

sentences.en: He is wearing a crisp new T-shirt that reads "Revolución Bolivarana". She has a large rucksack.
sentences.cn: 男的穿着崭新的T恤，上面印着：“玻利瓦尔革命”；女的有个大大的帆布背包。

sentences.en: He kindly carried our picnic in a rucksack.
sentences.cn: 他很体贴地背着装有我们野餐食物的背包。

sentences.en: He was weighted down with a heavy rucksack.
Her rucksack bobbed gently on her back.
sentences.cn: 她的帆布背包在她的背上轻轻震动.

sentences.en: In their view anybody with a rucksack and long hair is a hippy.
sentences.cn: 在他们看来,肩背帆布包、留长发的人都是嬉皮士.

sentences.en: Is it all right if I put my rucksack on the back seat?
sentences.cn: 我把帆布背包放在车后座上行 吗 ?

sentences.en: Marie slung her rucksack on the ground and sat beside it.
sentences.cn: 玛丽把背包往地上一放,在背包旁边坐下来.

sentences.en: My rucksack was too big for the luggage rack.
sentences.cn: 我的背包太大了，行李架上放不下。

sentences.en: She shouldered her rucksack and set off along the road.
sentences.cn: 她背起帆布背包就上路了.

sentences.en: She swung the rucksack ( up ) onto her back.
sentences.cn: 她把帆布背包转到身后.

sentences.en: She went this way and that over what to take, and packed and repacked the saddlebag and rucksack I had got hold of for her.
sentences.cn: 是走这条路线还是走那条路线，她忙得不可开交，打好包后，又把我为她找到的挎包和帆布背包装上东西。

sentences.en: They lay down , their rucksack still on their backs, passing the water bottle, almost dozing.
sentences.cn: 他们躺下来, 递过水瓶, 旅行包仍背在背后.他们几乎昏昏欲睡.

sentences.en: Use a weatherproof rucksack to carry your camera and lenses around in.
sentences.cn: 用防风雨的帆布背包装照相机和镜头。

sentences.en: You have to run five kilometers every morning, carrying a heavy rucksack and rifle.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨，你必须背着重重的帆布背包和步枪跑完5公里。

trans.tran_en: a bag used for carrying things on your back, especially by people on long walks
